Body: Description: We have added a website to the Deep Packet Inspection (DPI) allowlist and also included it in the policy allowlist within the CAP policy. After saving the policy, we received a confirmation that the policy was saved successfully. However, upon reviewing the policy afterward, it is not showing as expected, and this change is not reflecting on the user end.
What We've Learned Updated: We recreated the Allowlist, and add it again to CAP policy.

Next Steps Updated: - to schedule a session with the customer
- to wait for feedback from the customer after monitoring
